about_the_game:
This game is a captivating party game that allows up to 12 players to participate simultaneously. Players aim to uncover mysterious dark forces in their village while also utilizing the unique abilities of each villager. Players assume different roles, such as villagers, werewolves, and traitors. While villagers unite to protect their village, werewolves and traitors employ various tactics to manipulate the villagers and conceal their identities.



The game transitions between day and night cycles. During the night, when the dangers in the village are active, each villager possesses a special ability, using these abilities to defend their village. Daytime is the period for villagers to deduce who the enemies are and interrogate the players. Thoughtful reasoning and effective communication are crucial to determine who can be trusted and to avoid wrongful accusations.

The game's outcome depends on which team remains standing, and the unique abilities of each villager significantly influence the game's flow. The winning team becomes clear at the end, based on the players' tactical skills and deductive abilities. Provides a perfect opportunity for you to gather with your friends and experience a game filled with mystery and excitement. Each game is replete with new tactics, unexpected surprises, and changing dynamics, making it different and enjoyable each time. To win the game, you must employ all your intelligence and communication skills.



The villagers bear a significant responsibility to protect their village. While carrying out their duties, they strive to use their abilities and hold morning meetings to identify who the traitor or werewolf might be, aiming to safeguard their village from dangers. However, in order to utilize their abilities, they must complete all their tasks during the day. Failure to do so will result in them losing the right to use their abilities, potentially leaving their village vulnerable. Therefore, it is crucial for the villagers to collaborate and complete their tasks diligently.



When werewolves infiltrate the village, they refrain from performing any tasks during the daytime and make a concerted effort to blend in as if they are engaged in their chores. However, when night falls, the werewolves, working in unison, implement a chilling plan to eliminate all the villagers. They silently roam throughout the night, systematically hunting down one villager each night, creating a climate of panic and fear among the villagers.

One of the most sinister tactics employed by the werewolves is their attempt to appear innocent when morning arrives. This is a primary strategy for the werewolves, as they strive to gain the trust of the other villagers. Identifying the true villagers becomes increasingly challenging because the werewolves initially behave like any ordinary villager to avoid suspicion.



Traitors, when infiltrating among the villagers, strive to appear as one of them and blend in as if they are an ordinary member of the community. During the day, they carry out their tasks, acting like regular villagers to prevent suspicion and gain trust. However, during the night, they reveal their true identities and conspire to take control of the village, orchestrating schemes to sow discord, disrupt the village, and pit the villagers against each other by using their unique abilities.

Traitors adopt an extremely self-centered approach, not playing with anyone throughout the game, even considering other traitors as threats. Their goal is to win the game by eliminating everyone else, seizing control of the village, and being the last one standing. They spare no effort to achieve this objective, using any means, tricks, and intrigues at their disposal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better 6GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Traitor game involves up to 12 players uncovering dark forces in a village, taking on various roles, and testing their intelligence and communication. It transitions between day and night, with unique abilities for each player. The winning team is determined based on tactics and deduction.
